TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IGridItemProvider

summary.span: 公開方法和屬性，以支援使用者介面自動化用戶端存取可實作 之容器的個別子控制項。

span.span: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to individual child controls of containers that implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制可實作通常可周遊 （也就是使用者介面自動化用戶端可以移至相鄰的控制項） 使用鍵盤。Controls that implement can typically be traversed (that is, a UI Automation client can move to adjacent controls) by using the keyboard. 在必須支援的 UI 自動化提供者上實作控制項模式。Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the control pattern.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Column As Integer
public: property int Column { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得包含儲存格或項目之資料行的序號 (Ordinal Number)。

span.span: Gets the ordinal number of the column that contains the cell or item.

value.span: 以零起始的序號，識別包含儲存格或項目的資料行。

span.span: A zero-based ordinal number that identifies the column containing the cell or item.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會傳回儲存在內部變數的屬性。The following example code returns the property, which is stored in an internal variable. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ColumnSpan As Integer
public: property int ColumnSpan { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得儲存格或項目合併的資料行數目。

span.span: Gets the number of columns spanned by a cell or item.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會傳回的方格，其中的項目一律會橫跨單一資料行中的項目屬性。The following example code returns the property for an item in a grid whose items always span a single column.
